Want to also get started creating your own website?

Want to create your own free website? First create a quarto website on RStudio, then create a git repository for your website.

1.  Create a git repo
2.  Follow this: <https://docs.github.com/en/migrations/importing-source-code/using-the-command-line-to-import-source-code/adding-locally-hosted-code-to-github#importing-a-git-repository-with-the-command-line>
3.  And this: <https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/github-pages.html>
